Sentencas: Sulfur in the air stream is one of the primary contaminants affecting the stability of cathodes in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions

Sentencas: In this work, sulfur poisoning of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-delta (LSCF) thin films with different compositions was investigated.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions

Sentencas: The composition of the cathode was systematically controlled by preparing La0.75Sr0.42Co0.15Fe0.68O3-delta (A-site excess LSCF) and La0.60Sr0.39Co0.20Fe0.81O3-delta (stoichiometric LSCF) thin films on Gd-doped ceria (GDC) substrates by pulsed laser deposition.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions

Sentencas: The LSCF films were then heat-treated at 800 degrees C for 100 h in synthetic air with a trace amount of SO2 (ppb level).
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions

Sentencas: As an informative complement to the microstructural and compositional analyses, secondary ion mass spectrometry was also performed to effectively determine the extent of sulfur accumulations from LSCF cathode surface to GDC.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions

Sentencas: The results showed that sulfur poisoning behavior of LSCF cathodes depends strongly on composition.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions

Sentencas: The A-site excess LSCF films exhibited significant SrSO4 formation with severe porosity, whereas, only an isolated SrSO4 formation was observed in the stoichiometric LSCF films; instead, the partial poisoning by sulfur minimizes excessive porosity while enhancing Co-rich oxide precipitation.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectroscopy was carried out to further elucidate the influence of cathode composition on cell stability.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions

Sentencas: Thermodynamic considerations have been made to clarify the plausible chemical reaction mechanism between LSCF of different compositions with SO2.
Titulo: Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions
Sulfur poisoning behavior of La1-xSrxCo1-yFeyO3-δ thin films with different compositions
